Name: Sharp Ribbon
Block: Hold <button,b> to do a Sharp Block, which causes you to take 1 more damage instead of 1 less damage, but the enemy takes 1 damage as a contact hazard.

Name: Safety Ribbon
Block: Hold <button,a> to do a Safety Block, which acts the same as blocking normally but causes you to lose 2 energy every time.

Name: Beginner Ribbon
Rest Effect: Gain Stamina equal to half of your Agility.
Ribbon Power: Gives you 1 Defocus, Sunder and Enervate.

Name: Expert Ribbon
Block: Block window is decreased, but blocking reduces damage by 3 instead of 1.
Ribbon Power: Gives you 3 turns of Seal and Immunity.

Name: Champion Ribbon
Block: Quickly press <button,a> twice to do a Perfect Block, which will reduce damage by 4 and prevent most negative effects from being inflicted.
Rest Effect: If the user has no living allies, you get 5 hp and 5 ep.
Ribbon Power: Gives you 3 turns of Attack Down 1, Defense Down 1 and Endurance Down 1.

Name: Static Ribbon
Block: Tap <button,left> and <button,a> to do an Absorbing Block, which does not reduce damage taken but you gain energy equal to half the damage taken.

Name: Slimy Ribbon
Block: Tap <button,up> and <button,a> to do a Dark Block, which acts as a contact hazard that does 3 dark damage.
Rest Effect: Gives you Attack Up 1 for 3 turns

Name: Flashy Ribbon
Block: Tap <button,down> and <button,a> to do a Clear Block, which prevents most negative effects from being inflicted.
Rest Effect: Gives you Defense Up 1 for 3 turns

Name: Soft Ribbon
Block: Tap <button,right> and <button,a> to do a Soft Block, which reduces damage by 2 instead of 1.

Name: Mimic Ribbon
Passive: Mimics the effects and appearance of the ribbon the other character is wearing. No effect if they are not wearing any ribbons.

Name: Thorny Ribbon
Passive: Attack power increases by 1, but take 1 damage every turn.
Ribbon Power: Gives you 3 turns of Berserk and Focus 2.

Name: Diamond Ribbon
Block: Tap <button,b> and <button,a> to do a Diamond Block, which does not reduce damage taken but you gain coins equal to damage taken.

Name: Rainbow Ribbon
Block: Gives you access to the special blocking of the other ribbons.
